definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: In the addition, we give an upper bound for the spread of a nonnegative matrix.
sentences.chinese: 另外，我們還給出了非負矩陣分離度的上界估計。

sentences.english: This paper also represents some new results on upper bounds for the determinants of nonnormal matrices.
sentences.chinese: 本文還給出若干非正規陣的行列式新的上界估計式。

sentences.english: The lower bound of the subrange must not be greater than the upper bound.
sentences.chinese: 在指定子區域上限值時，上界值小於它的下限值。

sentences.english: For example, log utilization rate is an example of an upper bounded threshold indicator.
sentences.chinese: 例如，日誌利用率是一個設有上界的閾值指示器。

sentences.english: The formulas of drawing force for spiral internal-ribbed pipe cold-drawing are derived with upperbound method.
sentences.chinese: 利用上界法推導了冷拔內螺旋凸筋管拔制力計算式。

sentences.english: Based on the results, we calculate a upper bound or a lower bound of the Hausdorff dimension of some self-affine sets.
sentences.chinese: 利用它們可方便地求出某些自仿集維數的上界或下界。

sentences.english: An almost lower bound is defined similarly as an almost upper bound.
sentences.chinese: 殆下界的定義與殆上界是類似的。

sentences.english: In the last section, we prove minor arcs integral / has a smaller upper bound.
sentences.chinese: 在最後一節，證明劣弧的積分有一個較小的上界。

definition: lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
